an5.201:1: On one occasion the Blessed One was dwelling at Kimbilā in aniculagrove.[n.209] Be and Ee readveḷuvane, Ceniceluvane.MpBe hasniculavanein the lemma, glossed asmucalindavane. Both PED and SED listniculaas a kind of tree, identified asBarringtonia acutangula.Then the Venerable Kimbila approached the Blessed One, paid homage to him, sat down to one side, and said:
an5.201:2: "What is the cause and reason why, Bhante, the good Dhamma continues long after a Tathāgata has attained final nibbāna?"
